summary:
Senior leader who built financial programs and policies that reduced costs, controlled losses, and improved administrative and operational efficiency at Boston University, IBM and Microsoft Corporation. 

Successful transformation leader skilled in process improvement, change management, project and program management.  Certified Scrum Master.

Created programs that supported growth and profit and provided financial analysis of business cases for major solutions and projects.

education.field_of_study: Master's in Business Administration and Management

profile_positions.description:
Oversee finance and accounting staff, financial close, cash flow, regulatory compliance, budgeting, forecasting, strategy and process improvements.

•	Created and implemented segregation of duties where none existed.   Identified deficiencies and redefined job responsibilities to comply with GAAP.  Created supporting manual mitigating controls where needed.
•	Created and implemented revenue recognition polices for services, hardware and SAAS offerings. New offerings and outdated documentation resulted in the need to create and implement new processes.
•	Identified contracting changes that resulted in improved cash flow.  Contracts were not written with cash flow in mind. Recommendations that were implemented include up-front payments, annual price increases and restructuring of offerings.
•	Automated consolidation, FX and reporting which resulted in a two-day reduction in the Accounting close.  Implemented a new tool that eliminated the need to use Excel for monthly consolidation; automated intercompany accounting and FX entries and created Management Reports online instead of manually.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Finance

company.name: Eliasson Group / Experis Management Consulting / Independent

profile_positions.company: Eliasson Group / Experis Management Consulting / Independent
profile_positions.description:
Finance Digital Transformation Leader, corporate strategy and process improvement initiatives, merger integration, international project manager for money transfer Dodd Frank compliance, KYC, AML and finance transformation projects at Western Union. VP of Finance at ClinOne; Divisional CFO overseeing fixed price solution selling operations and finance at Symphony Teleca, CFO at Trimax Americas and Inovonics 

•	As VP of Finance (CFO) at ClinOne implemented GAAP compliant financials, created and implemented cash flow monitoring, collections processes, new contracts for cash flow improvement, COGS modeling creation and implementation, P&L by product offering; new billing modeling and tracking, 409A update, managed all HR, UK business entity creation, venture capital investment oversight and management
•	As division CFO, designed, created and implemented profitable new offering pricing for Symphony Teleca that drove improved margins.   Newly created business unit designed to sell fixed price offerings had no infrastructure, tools, processes or procedures.  
•	As division CFO, successfully drove cost saving initiatives at Symphony Teleca resulting in 20% increase in solution delivery gross margin. Worked with engagement delivery teams to reduce overall project costs while ensuring high customer satisfaction. 
•	As CFO, identified and corrected GAAP and operational issues at Data Glove.  High growth resulted in gaps in standard accounting, fulfillment processes and oversight of state regulatory issues.  Improved operational and financial processes resulting in reduction of risk and resource requirements.
• As a Project and Program manager at Prologis, oversaw the business and operational process development for a new procurement business and application.  Identified milestones and risks, developed procurement profitability metrics, hired, onboarded and managed project staff.; managed finance, audit, accounting, legal and procurement workstreams.
profile_positions.title: Executive Finance Transformation Consultant

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Finance Manager
Director of monthly finance close, P&L oversight, budgeting, forecasting, strategic planning and financial analysis. 
Financial Modeling and risk assessment.  
Ensure strong director level relationships. Manage $2B budgets.

•	Created offering level P&L that provided direction for profitability. Standard financial P&L statements did not provide the level of granularity needed to manage division. Designed P&L that gave better understanding of what drives profitability and how to best align resources

•	Improved forecast accuracy 20% and increased quota. Forecasting was inaccurate in two segments of the business. Collaborated with sales compensation executive to create and implement plan that increased quotas when unexpected / unplanned revenue was attained. Incentive to underestimate revenue was removed and extra sales compensation was reduced due to the quota increases. 

•	Established process to recognize forecast / budget risks, providing more time for corrective action. Division needed way of determining if month to date performance was sufficient to meet objectives. Created historical trending model that showed very consistent weekly revenue attainment over several years. From the trending model, developed and implemented standardized reports that showed where target revenue attainment was at risk.
profile_positions.title: Senior Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Finance Manager & Team Lead
Developed marketing metrics across IBM Americas. 
Oversaw reporting staff, marketing & sales and financial analysis.
Monitored budgeting, variance analysis and profitability. 
Presented reports to senior management, director of four staff and managed $5B budget.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Operations Leader - Software Group

profile_positions.description:
As Finance Manager, Distribution Channels, Operations Analyst
Analyzed effectiveness of marketing programs and campaigns, creating presentations for marketing managers and IBM executives.
Director of financial routes-to-market planning for $1.4B budget. 
Deployed lead targets, reporting, forecasting, budget analysis and ad-hoc reporting.
profile_positions.title: Distribution Channels Management, Printing Systems

profile_positions.description:
As Senior Financial Analyst
Managed $40M Information Technology budget, financial analysis, forecasting, and budget preparation. 
Identified cost savings, and developed database modeling, financial modeling, planning, business process improvements and ad-hoc reporting.
profile_positions.title: Senior Financial Analyst and Senior Financial Systems Printing Systems
